library(kableExtra) # Load kableExtra. Table generation.

library(rmdwc)

citation_count <-
  rmdcount(
    files = "report.Rmd",
    space = "[:space:]",
    word = "\\@",
    line = "\\n",
    exclude = "```\\{.*?```"
  )
